Consolidation and analysis of the data collected from the districts and provincial entities to prepare District Report Card (DRCs) and district heat maps and rankings based on development and non-salary data, which are presented in the weekly provincial budget execution meetings to give a picture of how each District is performing, relative to others, and highlight where there may be any issues), These meetings are co-chaired by the minister and / or Secretary E&SED.
Drafting of the minutes of the provincial budget execution meeting and its circulation over emails with relevant stakeholders so they can take the necessary actions in their districts.
